attributes.action: Reduce university loans for students courses affected by covid 2020 to 2021
attributes.additional_details:
Reduce these students loans by half at least
Look into costs incurred for accommodation fees paid out for whilst students were sent home 
Business got grants 
Individuals for furlough 
Students got forgotten
attributes.background:
Students studying online at home during the pandemic should not have to pay back the full £30,000 debt 
They had to pay for accommodation whilst staying at home too but had nothing back from the Government 
Forgotten society

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598155
